scenes.title: A Fork in the Road
scenes.text: You come to a fork in the road. Do you go left or right?

scenes.title: The River
scenes.text: You find a river. Do you swim across or walk along the bank?

scenes.title: The Forest
scenes.text: You enter a dark forest. Do you light a torch or proceed in the dark?

scenes.title: A Safe Place
scenes.text: You find a safe place to rest. The adventure continues...

scenes.title: A Sudden End
scenes.text: You encounter danger and your journey ends here.

scenes.title: The Lobby
scenes.text: You step into the lobby of an old building. An elevator door creaks open. Do you enter or take the stairs?

scenes.title: The Strange Descent
scenes.text: The elevator starts moving downward rapidly. Do you press the emergency button or wait it out?

scenes.title: The Stairwell
scenes.text: You climb the stairs and hear whispers. Do you call out or keep moving quietly?

scenes.title: A Hidden Room
scenes.text: You discover a hidden room filled with old equipment and mysterious symbols. The mystery deepens...

scenes.title: Trapped
scenes.text: You find yourself trapped in a strange dimension with no way back.
